alt: Olaf Scholz: Climate activists criticize him and his federal government. (Source: IMAGO/Christian Ditsch/imago-images-bilder)
article_heading: "He only seems to be on election posters"
description: The image shows a man from the chest up, facing slightly to the side. He appears to be middle-aged or older, with a fair complexion and short, graying hair. His facial expression is serious, with his lips tightly closed and his eyes looking directly at the camera. The man is wearing a dark suit with a white shirt and a tie that is not fully visible. The background is blurred, but it seems to be an indoor setting with a blue curtain or fabric to the right side of the frame. There are no visible texts or distinctive markings that provide additional context about the man or the setting. The style of the image is a standard portrait photograph with a focus on the subject.

alt: At the oil pipeline near Schwedt: The "Last Generation" was accused of this protest among other things. (Source: Twitter/Last Generation)

alt: "Climate protection is about more than just the climate": Luisa Neubauer at a demonstration against the AfD and the shift to the right in February in Dresden. (Source: IMAGO/Max Patzig/imago)
article_heading: "Without climate protection democracy cannot be defended"
description: The image depicts a woman standing on a stage, holding a microphone. She appears to be in the middle of a performance, as suggested by her confident posture and the microphone in her hand. The woman has long, wavy hair and is wearing a dark jacket over a maroon top. She is smiling and looking directly at the audience, which suggests she is engaging with them. The background is blurred, but it seems to be an outdoor setting with buildings that could be part of a cityscape. The lighting is bright, highlighting the woman and the microphone, which is the focal point of the image. The overall impression is of a live music performance, possibly at an outdoor event or festival.

alt: Activists wearing masks stand before the Higher Administrative Court in Berlin. The court ruled that the federal government must improve its climate protection. (Source: Sebastian Gollnow/dpa)
article_heading: Federal government must step up its efforts on climate protection
description: The image depicts a group of individuals participating in what appears to be a protest or demonstration. They are holding up signs with political slogans and caricatured portraits of politicians. The signs are written in German, with the names of politicians and political slogans. The caricatures are exaggerated and humorous, with large eyes and exaggerated facial features, which is a common style used in political satire. The people are dressed in casual attire, with some wearing jackets and others in coats, suggesting a variety of ages and genders. The setting appears to be an urban environment, possibly in a city center, given the architecture and the presence of other individuals in the background. The overall tone of the image is one of political activism and satire.

alt: The PCK refinery in Schwedt supplies large parts of northeast Germany with petrol and diesel (archive photo): Activists have been sentenced for protesting at the plant. (Source: Patrick Pleul/dpa/dpa)
article_heading: Seniors must be put behind bars for protest action
description: The image depicts an industrial scene with a large, complex structure that appears to be a chemical or petrochemical plant. The plant is composed of multiple towers and pipes, with various colors and materials, including green, yellow, and white. There are several signs and symbols visible, including a triangular warning sign with a red border and a white background, featuring a pictogram of a person and a hand, indicating caution or a hazard. Another sign shows a white background with a black pictogram of a person and an arrow, indicating a pedestrian crossing or path. The sky is overcast, suggesting an overcast or cloudy day. The style of the image is a standard, real-world photograph with no apparent filters or artistic effects.

alt: Vrbnik in the municipality of Krk in Croatia (archive photo): Environmental activists fear environmental pollution from the LNG terminal there. (Source: IMAGO/W.Simlinger/imago-images-bilder)
description: The image depicts a picturesque coastal scene with a small town perched on a rocky outcrop. The town is densely populated with buildings of various sizes and colors, including a prominent church with a tall steeple. The architecture suggests a European influence, possibly indicative of a Mediterranean coastal town.  The water is a vibrant turquoise, indicating clear and clean waters, which is typical of coastal areas known for their natural beauty. Several boats are anchored in the bay, including a sailboat with its mast standing tall, suggesting it might be used for recreational sailing. The boats are moored close to the shore, indicating a popular spot for boating activities.  The sky is a clear blue with a few scattered clouds, suggesting a sunny day with good weather. The overall scene is serene and idyllic, capturing the essence of a peaceful coastal town that is likely a popular destination for tourists and locals alike.

alt: After a technical defect in the sewage treatment plant in Crailsheim contaminated water flowed into the Jagst. (Symbolic photo) (Source: Bodo Marks/dpa)
article_heading: Fish die after sewage treatment plant accident
description: The image depicts a scene from a pond or a slow-moving body of water. At the center of the image is a dead fish, floating on its side. The fish appears to be a medium-sized specimen, with a pale body and darker spots or markings. Its head is submerged in the water, and it seems to be resting on a lily pad or similar aquatic plant. The water around the fish is murky, with visible ripples and small bubbles, suggesting recent movement or activity. The surrounding environment includes more lily pads and possibly other aquatic plants, creating a natural and somewhat overgrown setting. The image has a somewhat somber tone, capturing a moment of stillness and the end of life for the fish.

alt: The main bazaar in New Delhi in the afternoon (archive photo): Due to the high level of air pollution more people are dying in the Indian city. (Source: hadynyah/getty-images-bilder)
article_heading: The dirtier the air the more city dwellers die
description: The image depicts a bustling street scene in a densely populated urban area, likely in India, given the style of the buildings and the presence of auto rickshaws. The street is lined with a variety of shops, restaurants, and hotels, each with colorful signage and decorations. The architecture is a mix of traditional and modern styles, with many buildings featuring balconies and colorful awnings. The street is crowded with people, some of whom are riding motorcycles and auto rickshaws, while others are walking or standing. The sky is clear, suggesting fair weather. The overall atmosphere is vibrant and busy, typical of a lively city street in a developing country.

alt: That's how long the protest camp has held out on the planned Tesla expansion site. Now a bomb may be driving them away. (Source: Soeren Stache/dpa)
article_heading: Bomb found in the forest near Tesla
description: The image depicts a vibrant outdoor event set in a forested area. The forest is lush with tall, slender trees that tower over the scene, their green foliage forming a natural canopy. The ground is covered with a mix of grass and fallen leaves, suggesting a temperate climate.  In the center of the image, there is a gathering of people, possibly attendees of the event. They are standing and interacting with each other, some under the shade of the trees, others under a variety of colorful tents and flags. The tents are set up in a haphazard manner, with some closer to the camera and others further back, creating a sense of depth.  The event appears to be a festival or gathering, as indicated by the presence of multiple tents and flags. The flags are in various colors and designs, adding to the festive atmosphere. There are also several signs visible, including one that reads "DISRUPT," which could be the name of the event or a slogan.  The lighting suggests it might be daytime, and the overall mood of the image is lively and communal. The event seems to be a celebration or a gathering of some sort, with a focus on outdoor activities and social interaction.
